body: What are trails...? And why doesnt GOLD get any?
body_tagged: What are trails...? And why doesnt GOLD get any?
title: trails?

replies.body:
Trails are the things that follow you in the hub when you double jump. For example, the "cloud" trail will make little clouds come after you in the hub when you are double jumping.
Gold donators have access to trails.
replies.body_tagged:
Trails are the things that follow you in the hub when you double jump. For example, the "cloud" trail will make little clouds come after you in the hub when you are double jumping.
Gold donators have access to trails.

replies.body: I don't D: is something wrong with me? or do I have to buy them?
replies.body_tagged: I don't D: is something wrong with me? or do I have to buy them?

replies.body: I think you need particles on
replies.body_tagged: I think you need particles on

replies.body: No, Gold Donators dont have access to trails. Only Emerald and Diamond can use /trails properly....
replies.body_tagged: No, Gold Donators dont have access to trails. Only Emerald and Diamond can use /trails properly....
